Test plan showing issue

Issue occurs when selecting JSON rendering in View Results Tree

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: *** Bug 57764 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
text:
Created attachment 32619
Do not backtrack on string-value character

Use possessive operator (+) on string-value characters. That way the regex parser will not backtrack and the stackoverflow will go away.

Date: Sat Mar 28 17:42:39 2015
New Revision: 1669810

URL: http://svn.apache.org/r1669810
Log:
Don't fail on long strings in JSON responses when formatting them.

Bugzilla Id: 54826

Added:
    jmeter/trunk/test/src/org/apache/jmeter/visualizers/TestRenderAsJson.java
Modified:
    jmeter/trunk/src/components/org/apache/jmeter/visualizers/RenderAsJSON.java
    jmeter/trunk/xdocs/changes.xml
creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
